events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has a noticeable scratch and some dead pixels, making it unusable for work.
The customer's report about a scratched laptop screen and dead pixels has been categorized under Product Defect.
The case has been assigned to a technical support agent specialized in hardware issues.
Hello! I'm very sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. We'll do our best to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and any packaging damage so we can assess the situation?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratch and dead pixels on the display, as well as the box in which it arrived.
Thank you for the photos. We will arrange a replacement unit for you immediately and provide a pre-paid label for the faulty laptop return.
I appreciate the quick response and replacement offer. That solution works well for me. Thank you!
The replacement order has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to make sure your replacement laptop arrived safely and is working properly. Please update us at your convenience.
The new laptop arrived yesterday and the screen is perfect. Thanks again for the great support!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now, and feel free to reach out anytime if you need help.
